column4: rolnxyz_: what's this "sudo apt-cache search" thing? apt-cache search does *not* want or need sudo
really?  i've *always* had to type in sudo.  ??
you you don't. "apt-get install" wants sudo, since you're going to make changes to system stuff. "apt-cache search" just shows you the list of packages, and any user can call it.
